articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Brazilian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Brazilian Party Delegation 
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate Politburo member and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil headed by its International Secretary Nelson Chaves dos Santos on Wednesday.
					On the occasion the head of the delegation noted that the army and people of the DPRK firmly rallied around the WPK headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity through the celebrations of the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					
					 The Party for Free Motherland of Brazil will as ever extend full support to the Korean people in the efforts for the prosperity and the reunification of the country and strive to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the Workers' Party of Korea, he declared.

articles.title: Gift from Brazilian Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift from Brazilian Party Leader
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres, president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, upon his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and on the occasion of its 65th birthday.
					 The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Wednesday by Nelson Chaves dos Santos, international secretary of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Sweden
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Sweden 
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Fredrik Reinfeldt upon his reappointment as prime minister of Sweden.
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and the welfare of the people.
					
					 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Carl Bildt upon his reappointment as foreign minister of Sweden on the same day.

articles.title: Delegation of Hungarian Party Feted
articles.content:
Delegation of Hungarian Party Feted
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception for the visiting delegation of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Wednesday.
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party led by Chairman Gyula Thurmer.
					
					 Secretary Kim Yong Il and officials of the C.C., the WPK were on hand.
					
					 In his speech at the reception Kim Yong Il noted with high appreciation that the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party has worked hard to advance the socialist cause, invariably adhering to the revolutionary principle.
					
					 He expressed thanks to the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party for setting store by the development of the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and extending support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The WPK will as ever strive to strengthen the friendly relations between the two parties, he said.
					
					 Gyula Thurmer in his speech said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung set a shining example in the socialist construction, adding that he was very pleased to have an opportunity to see for himself the successes achieved by the Korean People.
					
					 The Hungarian communist warmly congratulate Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK at the recent Conference of the WPK, he noted, extending solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for building socialism under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Joint Masses Praying Held
articles.content:
Joint Masses Praying for National Reunification Held
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean joint masses of Buddhists praying for national reunification marking the third anniversary of the rebuilding of the Singye Temple in Mt. Kumgang took place on the spot on Wednesday. 
					 Present at the masses from the DPRK side were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Korean Buddhist Federation, priests of the temple and believers and from the south side priests of the Buddhist Jogye Order and believers.
					
					 A ritual was made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers noted that holding the inter-Korean joint masses praying for national reunification marking the third anniversary of the rebuilding of the Singye Temple, a symbol of the Buddhist temple for reunification of Korean Buddhists in the north and the south, was an expression of the will of the Buddhists in the north and the south for reunification to boost mutual solidarity and cooperation in the efforts to invariably preserve and implement the inter-Korean joint declarations and achieve national reunification. 
					
					 A joint written prayer was read out there. It reflected the will of the Buddhists in the north and the south to pave the way for the tour of Mt. Kumgang and a pilgrimage to the Singye Temple, improve the inter-Korean relations and actively turn out in actions for the reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here 
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party led by Chairman Gyula Thurmer and a delegation of the State Intellectual Property Office of the People's Republic of China led by Deputy Commissioner Li Yuguang arrived here by air on Wednesday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition Wednesday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The members of the corps looked round photos showing the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who opened up a new path for revolutionary party building in the era of independence and developed the WPK into an invincible guiding force, and their works and Korean books.
					
					 At the end of their visit, they made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Mongolian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Mongolian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar and staff members of the Mongolian embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Jongbang Co-op Farm in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province on Wednesday.
					 They helped farmers in harvesting bean.
					
					 The guests handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Reception Given by Chief of Libyan Economic Bureau
articles.content:
Reception Given by Chief of Libyan Economic Bureau
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Muhammad Mustafa, chief of the Economic Cooperation Bureau of Libya to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club Wednesday to mark the 41st anniversary of the Great September First Revolution in Libya.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Mun Song Mo, director of the Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, and officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Political parties, governments, ministries, organizations and figures from all walks life in different countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries on Oct. 6 and 8 in celebration of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them were the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Ministry of Defence, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, the Ministry of Industry and Commerce, the Department of International Cooperation of the Ministry of Public Security, the Ho Chi Minh Museum, the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union, the Ho Chi Minh State Policy and Administration School, the Farmers Union, the Institute for Northeast Asian Studies of the Academy of Social Science, the Diplomatic Corp Service Department, the General Department of National Service and the Viettel Group of Vietnam, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Commission of the External Affairs and the Propaganda and Education Ideological Commission of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Editorial Bureau of the Newspaper of the Central Committee of the Lao Women's Union, the Workers' Party, the People's Socialist Party and the S
					
					 ocialist Popular Party of Mexico, the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Friend Association for Memory of the President Kim Il Sung and the Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification of Mexico, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, the member of the Secretariat and chairman of the Organization Commission of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the vice-minister of Defence who is director of the General Political Department of the Laotian People's Army, the president of the National Politics and Administration School, the secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, the chairman of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association and the chairman and the general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions 
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in the relevant countries on Oct. 5 and 6 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and to celebrate the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 They included a delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar and delegations of the Maritime Territorial Branch of "United Russia", the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of "A Just Russia", the maritime territorial committees of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and its youth league.
					
					 The delegations laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the full-length painting of them before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Light-burnt Magnesia Begins to Be Produced with Domestic Fuel
articles.content:
Light-burnt Magnesia Begins to Be Produced with Domestic Fuel
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Tanchon Magnesia Factory, a major fireproof materials producer of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, has been newly equipped with a modern production process of light-burnt magnesia based on fuel available in the country.
					 It had produced light-burnt magnesia in a revolving kiln with imported fuel so that the output could not be kept on a high level.
					
					 The new production process, built by the factory itself, makes it possible to sharply increase the output of light-burnt magnesia, which is badly needed for the economic growth and the people's living.
					
					 The method of producing light-burnt magnesia in a revolving kiln with locally available fuel is very high in economic effectiveness.
					
					 It easily monitors the burning degree, properly controls the temperature of the kiln and ensures continuous production and high quality of slightly burnt magnesia.
					
					 Installed in the new production process was an up-to-date dust arrester.

articles.title: Speech Consistent with Idea of National Unity
articles.content:
Speech Consistent with Idea of National Unity
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Sixty-five years has passed since President Kim Il Sung delivered a historic speech on October 14, Juche 34 (1945) after his triumphant return to the homeland.
					 In the speech he called on all the Korean people to turn out in the building of a new country with concerted efforts.
					
					 The Korean people were all excited over the liberation of the country from scores of years of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule in August 1945.
					
					 Along with the excitement, their zeal for building a new society was running high as well. But they did not know what and how to do first.
					
					 Soon after returning to the homeland, the President advanced a policy of founding a party at an early date to guide the people of all social strata in a correct way to build new Korea.
					
					 He declared the founding of the party at the Inaugural Congress of the Central Organizing Committee of the Communist Party of North Korea held over October 10-13.
					
					 At the end of the congress, a decision on convening a mass meeting in welcome of the President was adopted with unanimity.
					
					 At the meeting held in Pyongyang on October 14, the President delivered a speech titled "Every Effort for the Building of a New, Democratic Korea".
					
					 He called upon the people with strength to give strength, those with knowledge to dedicate knowledge, those with money to donate money in order to make a tangible contribution to the state building. He also appealed to all people truly loving their country, their nation and democracy to unite closely and build an independent and sovereign democratic state.
					
					 Stormy cheers went up when he concluded the speech. His speech touched the Korean people to the heart.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Exploits Performed in Human Cause of Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Exploits Performed in Human Cause of Independence
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea has consistently preserved its revolutionary character and purity and increased its leadership function and role despite the severe test of history, thus performing immortal exploits for the country and the nation and the history of the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The WPK's exploits precisely mean those of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The President was the founder and builder of the WPK and outstanding leader of the cause of global independence. 
					
					 He authored many famous works such as "Progressive Journalists of the Five Continents, Wield Your Powerful Revolutionary Pen and Sternly Condemn U.S. Imperialism!", "For a Free and Peaceful New World" and "Preventing War and Preserving Peace are the Burning Tasks of Mankind". These works comprehensively deal with all theoretical and practical issues of protecting the peace and security of the world from aggression and war and achieving victory of the human cause of independence. 
					
					 During his lifetime the President met many foreign leaders, high-ranking politicians and personages from all walks of life, giving them valuable instructions on defending the peace and security of the world and advancing the human cause of independence and leading all of them in the efforts to accomplish the cause of global independence. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il who has strengthened and developed the WPK into a model of the world revolutionary parties set forth a peculiar political mode called Songun politics, the first of its kind in history, and saved the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism, from a crisis and brought about a bright prospect of the cause of global independence, weathering the stern tempest of history created by the imperialist forces with his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 He provided the world progressive forces with strategic tactics and ways to unite close, guided by the idea of independence, peace and friendship, and boost the joint actions and solidarity in the struggle for achieving independence against imperialism and defending peace from war and has wisely led it. This is an immortal contribution made by him to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and leadership, the world anti-imperialist independent forces including the progressive political parties have grown strong in their unity and might and the victory of the cause of global independence is guaranteed, concludes the article.

articles.title: General Advance toward Fresh Victory Called for
articles.content:
General Advance toward Fresh Victory Called for
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls on all the people to make general advance toward fresh victory, loudly sounding the advance of the revolution with the same enthusiasm and spirit with which they successfully celebrated the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea as the grand revolutionary festival, demonstrating the honor of Kim Il Sung's Korea after holding leader Kim Jong Il at the top post of the party and the revolution.
					 The 65th founding anniversary of the WPK marked a historic and great festival that provided a landmark of a drastic change in building a thriving nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The WPK Conference that was held on the threshold of the October holiday was a historic event that opened up a phase of fresh epoch-making turn in the history of the country and in developing the revolution. Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK at the Conference was the greatest honor and happiness of the party members, service persons and other people and the great auspicious event of the country and the nation. The WPK rules were modified as required by the developing revolution and the party central leadership body was elected. This resulted in strengthening the party organizationally and ideologically and drastically raising its leadership role.
					
					 Spectacular miracles were wrought and a great number of monumental edifices in the era of Songun proving that Korea can do anything once it is determined sprang up amid a high-pitched drive to greet the party's birthday with high revolutionary enthusiasm and shining labor achievements.
					
					 Miraculous changes took place one after another this year, too, in the wake of last year, a year of great change. This clearly proves that no force can curb the general march of the DPRK and it is sure to triumph in building a thriving nation.
					
					 It is the immutable faith of the army and people of the DPRK that they are sure to attain the high goal of building a thriving nation despite whatever difficulties and hardship if they advance following the leadership of the great party.
					
					 The sacred party flag associated with the victory and glory of the WPK flutters high in the van of the advancing ranks and the rosy future of a thriving nation encourages us to perform feats in fresh struggle, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Best Option for Korean Reunification
articles.content:
Best Option for Korean Reunification 
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- There is a way for the Koreans to live and a sure guarantee for peace on the Korean Peninsula and prosperity common to the nation only when reunification is achieved by federal formula. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo based on one nation, one state and two systems and two governments set forth by President Kim Il Sung at the Six Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is a blueprint and a great charter of independent national reunification as it indicates the whole appearance of a unified state and the ways to realize it, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The proposal for reunifying the country by federal formula is the most just reunification proposal, an embodiment of the three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, a  programme for reunification common to the nation.
					
					 The above-said proposal fairly takes into consideration the interests of authorities, people from all walks of life, parties and groupings in the north and the south, and does not allow the interests of any side, class and grouping to be infringed upon. 
					
					 This does not create any conditions for the north and the south to stand in confrontation or fight over the issue of each other's interests. It, therefore, helps root out the confrontation and military conflict between the north and the south.
					
					 It is the course of achieving the firm unity of the divided nation for the north and the south to found a federal state. In a federal state, all the Koreans in the north and the south will be able to unite close irrespective of ideas and systems and put strong spurs to the independent development of the nation and its prosperity.
					
					 It is the irresistible trend of the era of the June 15 reunification to head for achieving reunification by federal formula. 
					
					 In the historic June 15 joint declaration the north and the south recognized the common points in the north side-proposed low-level federation and the south side-proposed confederation and agreed to work for reunification in this direction in the future.
					
					 This is the great progress made by the Koreans in the efforts to achieve reunification by federal formula.

articles.title: S. Korean Minister of "Unification's" Outbursts Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification's Outbursts Flayed
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Puppet Minister of Unification of south Korea Hyon In Thaek was recently reported to have talked nonsense in Germany that "the experience" gained by someone "in achieving unification" could "serve as an example" and south Korea could "make preparations for unification" on its basis. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 His outbursts were a blatant challenge to all the Koreans who wish to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country through inter-Korean reconciliation and unity and a provocation to the DPRK as he openly disclosed his scenario for achieving the "unification of systems".
					
					  It was a folly and disclosure of ignorance that traitor Hyon In Thaek sought the "unification of systems" which does not suit the actual conditions of Korea at all.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations had made steady progress since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration but were brought to the present catastrophe entirely because of the reckless actions of such confrontation-minded maniacs as Hyon who have made desperate efforts to do harm to the ideology and system of compatriots, regarding them as a thorn in the flesh.
					
					 The north and the south had already clarified ways to achieve the country's reunification in conformity with the aspiration of all the Koreans and the interests of the north and the south through the historic June 15 joint declaration. The above-said outbursts let loose by the confrontation-minded maniacs ignorant of this only reveal the treacherous scenario to realize the ambition for "unification through invasion against the north", far from working to attain independent reunification through the inter-Korean reconciliation and unity.
					
					 In the final analysis, "preparations for achieving unification" touted by Hyon are aimed to disarm the DPRK, lead it to reforms and opening in a bid to realize the ambition for "unification under liberal democracy."
					
					 Such wicked confrontation-minded maniac as Hyon should be eliminated if the inter-Korean relations are to be saved from a collapse and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country is to be achieved.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to drop their foolish daydream. The inter-Korean relations can never get rid of the catastrophe as long as they are allowed to persistently pursue the above-said wild ambition.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Remains of Koreans Demanded
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Remains of Koreans Demanded
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting for hearing testimonies for finding a solution to the issue of remains of Koreans by the concerted efforts of their bereaved families in the DPRK and south Korea was held in Tokyo on Oct. 7.
					 Present there were co-representatives of the National Liaison Committee for "the settlement of the issue of remains of Koreans by the concerted efforts of their bereaved families in the DPRK and south Korea", the Koreans concerned of the Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans in Tokyo, Dietmen, citizens, members of social organizations and bereaved families of Korean victims of the forcible drafting in Japan.
					
					 At the meeting the reporter and speaker accused the Japanese government of still refusing to properly solve the issue of the remains of Koreans who were killed after forcibly drafted to Japan.
					
					 They urged the Japanese government to duly admit Japan's past crimes related to the forcible drafting, own responsibility for them and make apology and reparation for them.
					
					 They demanded Japan thoroughly investigate the above-said issue and send all the remains to their families.
					
					 Dietmen from the Democratic Party and Social-Democratic Party of Japan in their speeches declared that they would strengthen the contact with civic and social organizations across Japan to urge the Japanese government to actively come out in the work for the return of the remains to their families.
					
					 Members of the bereaved families also took the floor.
					
					 Saying that they could hardly repress their resentment at the Japanese government's refusal to make public the list of remains of those killed, they held that Japan should settle the issue from the stand of redressing its past crimes by itself.
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Halt to DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social organizations in south Korea including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Social Progress and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a press conference in front of the puppet ministry of Defense on Monday in denunciation of the bellicose forces' war exercises to invade the DPRK.
					 At the conference the speakers accused the south Korean authorities of contemplating staging PSI-related maritime interception and search exercises.
					
					 They blasted the U.S. for talking about PSI although it produced more weapons of mass destruction and ignited more wars than any other country in the world.
					
					 What is intolerable is that the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force" will be involved in them, they said, noting that it has become clear that the projected military exercises are part of the moves to realize a triangular military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 They demanded the war-like forces stop at once the war exercises escalating confrontation and the danger of a war.
					
					 A press release was read out at the conference.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Marked 
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar on exploits, a meeting and a photo exhibition took place in Mongolia, a lecture in Romania, a lecture and a film show in Pakistan and an opening ceremony of a week of Korean photo exhibition in Nigeria between Sept. 29 and Oct. 5 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and celebrate the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 On display in the venues of the photo exhibitions were photos showing the achievements made by the Korean people.
					
					 The executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development noted in his speech that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK was a historic event of great significance in the struggle for strengthening and developing the party and bringing earlier a final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The secretary general of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association noted in the lecture that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has grown stronger to be an invincible revolutionary party, meeting all challenges of history under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The information secretary of the Punjab Provincial Committee who doubles as member of the Central Executive Committee of the Pakistan People's Party in the lecture praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest and successful statesman as he explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence and set a model of a ruling party under socialism. 
					
					 The participants of the film show watched the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Meanwhile, a seminar and a lecture took place in Britain and Ethiopia on Oct. 4 and 5 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Mongolia, Romania and Britain.

articles.title: WPK Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
WPK Praised by British Organizations
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Oct. 8 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The DPRK is now wrapped in an elated festive atmosphere as General Secretary Kim Jong Il was reelected as general secretary of the WPK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK founded on Oct. 10, 1945 has its historical roots in the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle led by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The revolutionary traditions established during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle serve as an eternal foundation of the WPK and the DPRK.
					
					 The WPK achieved the unity of its ranks in idea and will and the single-minded unity of the whole society on basis of the Juche idea.
					
					 The WPK has registered immortal feats to shine long in history over the last 65 years, firmly adhering to the principle of independence under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK, socialism in the DPRK has won one victory after another despite the ceaseless moves of the U.S. imperialists and world reactionaries to stifle it.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a bulwark of socialism in the world and the Korean people have achieved great successes in building a thriving nation with each passing day.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by British Organization
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by British Organization
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The British branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain released a statement on Oct. 6 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 The statement recalled that President Kim Il Sung set forth the proposal at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and this marked a historic event in the struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 Noting that this proposal fully embodies the principle of national independence, great national unity and the principle of democracy, the statement added that the WPK and the government of the DPRK have made big efforts to put the proposal into practice.
					
					 The organization urges the U.S. to pull its forces out of south Korea and dismantle its military bases there and the south Korean authorities to halt their anti-DPRK confrontation racket and roll back their pro-U.S. sycophantic policy and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as specific actions for materializing the above-said proposal, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Seminars on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" took place in South Africa and India on Oct. 1 and 7 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues of the seminars were books and photos introducing the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in party building and the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, recalled that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK represented the absolute support and trust of all the Korean people in him who ushered in a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il in his work indicated the way for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche by developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President in the future, too, adding that under his wise leadership the WPK is demonstrating only victory and glory in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, deeply rooted among the people.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con oficiales de mando de desfile militar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con oficiales de mando de desfile militar
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio y se fotografio junto con los oficiales de mando participantes en el desfile militar en homenaje al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					  Todos los participantes acogieron hospitalariamente al Dirigente dandole el maximo honor y el mas calido agradecimiento a el quien fortalecio el PTC como partido eterno de             Kim Il Sung y poderosa guia de la revolucion del Songun que controla las fuerzas armadas.
					
					  El Dirigente reciproco el saludo con su mano alzada.
					
					  Felicito calidamente a los oficiales de mando de las unidades participantes en el desfile militar y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					  El Dirigente expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que todos ellos cumpliran el papel de vanguardia en la materializacion de la linea militar del partido y elevaran la combatividad de las unidades para contribuir activamente a defender la patria socialista de modo inexpugnable.
					
					  En esta ocasion estuvieron presentes Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del CC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Yong Chun, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Ju Sang Song, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, los miembros de mando operacional de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC, los comandantes de todos los ejercitos y armas y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y O Il Jong, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il se reune con delegacion de partido brasileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il se reune con delegacion de partido brasileno 
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- El miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il, departio el dia 13 con la delegacion del Partido por la Patria Libre de Brasil encabezada por el secretario internacional, Nelson Chaves dos Santos.
					   En la ocasion el jefe de la delegacion menciono que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, unidos compactamente en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, han manifestado el poderio de la unidad monolitica a traves de los actos festivos del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC. 
					
					  Afirmo que en lo adelante tambien, el Partido por la Patria Libre de Brasil enviara irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del pueblo coreano por la prosperidad y la reunificacion del pais y se esforzara activamente por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de presidente de PPLB
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de presidente de PPLB 
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que con motivo de su reeleccion como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, le dedicara el presidente del Partido por la Patria Libre de Brasil, Sergio Rubens De Araujo Torres.
					  El secretario internacional de ese partido brasileno Nelson Chaves Dos Santos, de visita en Corea, lo entrego el dia 13 al miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il.

articles.title: Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por la reunificacion de la patria
articles.content:
Acto conjunto de budistas Norte-Sur por la reunificacion de la patria
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en el Templo Singye del monte Kumgang el "Acto budista conjunto Norte-Sur para la reunificacion de la patria en conmemoracion del III aniversario de la reconstruccion del Templo Singye del monte Kumgang".
					  En la ocasion participaron los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, los monjes y los creyentes del Templo Singye por la parte norcoreana, y, por la surcoreana, los monjes y creyentes de la Orden Budista Jogye del Sur de Corea.
					
					  En el acto hubo la ceremonia budista y discursos.
					
					  Los oradores dijeron que los budistas del Norte y el Sur de Corea sostienen este acto en ocasion del III aniversario de la reconstruccion del Templo Singye, simbolo de los templos budistas de ambas partes por la reunificacion.
					
					　Continuaron que esto deviene la demostracion de la voluntad de los budistas norcoreanos y surcoreanos de fortalecer mas la solidaridad y la cooperacion entre si en el camino para mantener y ejecutar invariablemente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y lograr la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  En el acto se dio lectura a la oracion conjunta que refleja la decision de los budistas de ambas partes de abrir las rutas de turismo al monte Kumgang y de peregrinacion al Templo Singye y de tomar parte activa en las acciones para mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y alcanzar la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais.
